title: Ticket #556: MAX_JOBS_RUNNING inconsistent with queue after condor_rm -force
description:
Schedd is logging MAX_JOBS_RUNNING reached when condor_q against the same schedd does not agree after using condor_rm -forcex.

Seems like condor_rm -forcex should either

  1. try to send a kill -9 to the corresponding shadows, or
  2. decrement the max_job_running counter, or both.

See rust ticket for details.
remarks:
